lead_paragraph: Scotland, Wales, Northern Ireland and the Republic of Ireland have agreed in principle to play each other in a tournament every other year starting in 2009, the Football Association of Ireland said. It would be similar to the defunct Home International Championship, which featured England instead of the Republic of Ireland.
